content: i loved making this bowl coaster & it s a nice small project to use up your leftovers i used a larger hook than the yarn asks for because it turns out nicer when the coaster is felted donegal tweed is one of my favorite yarns even after felting those tiny tweedy dots are still visible finished size = 17 cm as you can see in the photos herman and i had a great time during the photo session my noodle experience was cozy and herman actually enjoyed some seaweed make sure you use a 100% wool feltable yarn happy crocheting
